title: SU Soldier Pack: Infantry Medic
description: This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.
longDescription:
This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.

# Contents
- Infantry Soldier
- PPSh-41
- Tula Tokarev 33
- RGD-33
- t-20 Komsomolets
- 42WLA Lend Lease
- Soviet Medic Pouch
- 14 day Veteran Membership
- 3 x PPSh-41 Specialist Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Chauffeur Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Physical Training Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Medic Ribbon Booster
- 3 x SMG Assault

#  PPSh-41
The PPSh-41 is a Soviet submachine gun. It uses the standard 7.62x25mm Tokarev pistol ammunition. A high rate of fire combined with a very large magazine gives it an impressive amount of firepower, but takes a very experienced soldier to control.

# Tula Tokarev 33
The TT-33 is a soviet semi-automatic pistol. As with most Russian designs it is simple to manufacture and easy to operate and maintain. It is a formidable weapon, with good penetration and effective range.

# RGD-33
The standard Soviet hand grenade with a frag sleeve. Very easy to use. The RGD-33 fits nicely in right between the German stick grenades and the US Mk. II, both in how far they can be thrown and damage.

# t-20 Komsomolets
The T-20 is a small and versatile tractor. Originally designed for towing artillery pieces, it is well liked and often used by infantry for transportation to the front line. It is lightly armored and armed with a light machine gun for protection.

# 42WLA Lend Lease
The 42WLA is an army motorcycle used for quick transportation of troops or scouting. The motorcycle can be used to get one or two soldiers behind enemy positions for a surprise attack or reconnaissance.

# Soviet Medic Pouch
A medic pouch is used by soldiers to carry a small supply of first aid kits intended to help wounded soldiers. The pouch can be resupplied at any medic crate on the battlefield.

# Veteran Membership
Progress faster and earn more Credits and Warfunds!

# Ribbon Boosters
Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.
